meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dylan Hume Elaine Moise Aaron Cappocchi Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6396.

td.p: Dylan Hume, a musician and tutor from Sleepy Hollow, New York
Elaine Moise, a business systems manager from Mountain View, California
Aaron Cappocchi, a writer from Burbank, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,800)

tr.td: WHAT'S UP, DOC?
THE TEAM'S RETIRED NUMBERS
SEE-ATTLE
THE HELOISE WITH YOU
"PIPE" DREAMS
SPAIN KILLERS

(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[Aaron\'s response was initially rejected as incorrect. After the reveal of both of the contestant\'s responses, Alex appeared back on-screen in an edit and stated the following:]
(Alex: If that Final Jeopardy! seemed a little strange, it\'s because it was. We messed up. We were thinking of one thing and referencing something else. Fortunately, it did not affect the outcome of the game. We are crediting Aaron with a correct response, and we will be awarding him $12,002.)
ElaineWhat is the Last Supper?
$6,500
AaronWhat is Pentecost?
$6,001
the Last Supper')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Acts 1:13 says this event occurred in "an upper room"')

tr.td: EVENTS IN THE BIBLE
Acts 1:13 says this event occurred in "an upper room"
Aaron
Elaine
Dylan
2-day champion: $56,101
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Aaron
Elaine
Dylan

24 R
(including 1 DD),
